title: VR-Based Multilingual Modular Mathematics Concept Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical terminology and comprehension of work-related mathematical concepts
context.additional_context: Multilingual math concept learning and enhancement of job-applicable skills in a smartphone-based VR environment

learning_goals: Learners will be able to contextualize and explain mathematical concepts presented in three languages (Korean/English/second language) within an immersive VR environment.
Learners will accurately perform mathematical problem-solving procedures applicable to real-world tasks in interactive VR simulations with over 80% accuracy.
Learners will be able to establish strategies for multilingual mathematical terminology conversion and application based on metalinguistic awareness developed during the learning process.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
